hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "All of you are guardians and are responsible for your wards. The ruler is a guardian and the man is a guardian of his family; the lady is a guardian and is responsible for her husband's house and his offspring; and so all of you are guardians and are responsible for your wards

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمَرْأَةُ رَاعِيَةٌ فِي بَيْتِ زَوْجِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The woman is a guardian in her husband's house
